Observed at: St. Peters 6:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low zero.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
